title: People don't duo because they WANT to. They Duo because its the only way to climb effectively......
body: Nobody wants to play with their friends truthfully. They play with their "Friends" because that means you have 1 less retard on your team. Cool stuff huh.

replies.body: They should just make solo queue pure solo like they said they would. We have a flex queue for premades already. Just level the playing field already.
Playing duo is for scrubs that can't climb by themselves

Actually you play with your friend because you know you can use a voice app like Discord and be more effective, even if both of you aren't that great of players. Coordinating via communication is a huge advantage in this game, and honestly is how some champions end up being balanced around.
Not for me typically, my IRL friends on league think I can destroy Darius when I play Nasus so they NEVER gank and accuse me of inting when I'm like 0/10 against the fucker

> [{quoted}](name=Corsair Sion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sA2VVAgW,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-03T14:42:47.777+0000)
>
> what does that even mean????

When I duo it's hell
and no i'm not talking about climbing in silver for all of you morons
I mean. Sorry you don't have friends, I guess? Get more friends?
